article_title: Why Supreme Court Obamacare Decision Is Great for Uber

twitter.description: Uber may have publicly praised Supreme Court’s Friday decision clearing the way for nationwide same-sex marriage, but a decision that came a day earlier promises a bigger impact on the ride-h...
twitter.title: Why the Obamacare decision is great for Uber
